statements: DELETE FROM customer_engagement_reports WHERE customer_id = 500 AND completed = TRUE;
DELETE FROM customer_engagement_reports WHERE report_id = 100 AND customer_id = 500
DELETE FROM customer_engagement_reports WHERE completed = true AND visit_timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM EngagementChannels WHERE customer_id = 5 AND engagement_type='Email';
DELETE FROM EngagementChannels WHERE channel_name = 'Email' AND engagement_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customer_channel_interaction WHERE customer_id = 101 AND channel_name = 'Email' AND interaction_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM channel_performance_report WHERE total_interactions < 1000 AND average_engagement_score < 4.0;
DELETE FROM Channel WHERE channel_name = 'Social Media';
DELETE FROM channels WHERE channel_name = 'Social Media';
